metadata.title: Codefend Home: Vulnerability Identification, Penetration Testing, and Red Teaming Services
metadata.description: Codefend offers a comprehensive cybersecurity platform to identify and address vulnerabilities in your infrastructure. Our services include vulnerability identification, penetration testing, red teaming, and bug bounty programs to protect your organization from cyber attacks.

description.text: to prevent business continuity disruption, reputational and monetary loss. To make this possible we employ a multifaceted approach that encompasses custom software and hardware, proactive threat monitoring, and a team of skilled experts, including researchers and informants.
Monitorea tus activos digitales de forma permanente con nuestras suscripciones mensuales. Recibe notificaciones instantáneas de vulnerabilidades detectadas en tu correo electrónico.
Realizamos operaciones de monitoreo continuo en foros de hacking, dentro de la dark web y en redes sociales para identificar amenazas y vulnerabilidades que puedan afectar a tu organización.

Revise toda su infrastructura crítica con un pentest completo. Reciba un reporte detallado con las vulnerabilidades encontradas y recomendaciones para mitigarlas. Vulnerabilidades comunicadas en 24 horas.

intro.text: Codefend serves all its clients via a web application. From this platform,
we establish secure & encrypted communications with your company's staff
. Codefend conducts systematic supervision of your infrastructure, employing diverse techniques and private information providers.

description.text: We believe information security should be continuous. Users can request pentesting whenever needed—whether it's for a new webpage, a new section, or a new mobile app. Vulnerabilities are promptly reported on our platform.

Traditional security companies run scans once a year. With Codefend, you can see bugs and issues as soon as the pentester finds them. Our system delivers daily scans and immediate notifications, allowing you to address issues as they appear.

Codefend isn't your typical cybersecurity firm. Beyond standard compliance reports for your web applications, we gather insights from various private communities where true hackers operate. This gives Codefend distinct edge over other security companies relying on conventional tools.

From the vulnerabilities section, you can access a comprehensive list of all vulnerabilities and issues identified in your application to date. By clicking on each item, you will be able to view detailed information and further insights regarding each issue. This will allow you to stay informed and take the necessary steps to address and resolve potential security risks.

ourServices.title: Our services
ourServices.description: Codefend offers cybersecurity intel, research, and security services, all unified in a unique platform. This platform allows you to monitor your assets, infrastructure, and your organization's security, while establishing direct communication between our professionals and your security team. Our conventional services include:

left.title: web application security
left.description: Codefend does manual and semi-automated penetration testing processes using commercial and proprietary security software to evaluate your web application from the perspective of anonymous and authenticated users.

left.title: external network security
left.description: Reinforce the robustness of your internal network with our specialized assessments. Our expertise ensures a stronger infrastructure, protecting not only your data but also the trust of your customers and employees.

left.title: cloud infrastructure solutions
left.description: Perform periodic reviews during the development of your software and before your product launch. Codefend will detect vulnerabilities and fix security issues in your applications to increase your defenses against potential threats.

left.title: intel & research services
left.description: Gather actionable intelligence with our open source and human Intelligence services. Improve your decision-making and stay ahead of the competition with our decentralized open source intel services.

right.title: mobile application security
right.description: Ensure the security of your mobile application with our decentralized mobile application pentest services. Protect your user’s sensitive information with our professional services.

right.title: internal network security
right.description: Reinforce the robustness of your internal network with our specialized assessments. Our expertise ensures a stronger infrastructure, protecting not only your data but also the trust of your customers and employees.

right.title: source code review
right.description: Perform periodic reviews during the development of your software and before your product launch. Codefend will detect vulnerabilities and fix security issues in your applications to increase your defenses against potential threats.

right.title: advanced se
right.description: Rise your company defenses against phishing, smishing and vishing attacks with our social engineering services. Improve your security posture and educate your employees with our social engineering services.

metadata.title: Codefend Software: Comprehensive Cybersecurity for Your Organization
metadata.description: Discover how Codefend software provides a comprehensive solution for all your company's security needs. Our application offers a wide range of services to protect your organization from cyber threats, allowing you to tailor your security plan to fit your specific requirements and budget. With continuous pentesting, attack surface surveillance, and real-time threat detection, Codefend ensures full-time protection for your CI/CD cycles and infrastructure.

columned.title: Instant Reports
columned.description: Easy and fast reports: Filter vulnerabilities according to the type of resource and generate an on-demand report whenever you need it, ensuring actionable insights quickly.

columned.title: Vulnerabilities overview
columned.description: Quick visualization of vulnerabilities: Easily monitor the criticality associated with each vulnerability, and see which ones are active and which are resolved.

columnota.title: Get all vulnerability details
columnota.description: Gain precise and actionable insights into every identified vulnerability, including its technical description, potential business impact, remediation complexity, and recommended steps to resolve it effectively.

column.title: Comply with Standards
column.description: Vulnerabilities: Filter vulnerabilities according to the type of resource and generate an on-demand report whenever you need it.

sections.title: Scope / Attack Surface Definition
sections.description: The application counts with 6 different modules exclusively dedicated to scope and attack surface. Each one of this modules corresponds with an unique type of asset to be pentested / scoped. For example, if you only desire to check your web and mobile applications, you can leave the rest of the scope unfilled.

items.title: Web Resources
items.description: In this section you can include domains and subdomains to be pentested. The application comes with an integrated feature to detect subdomains, and our default policy is to detect shadow IT as soon as possible, so your attack surface or scoping can be expanded or contracted any time your organization requires it.

items.title: Mobile Resources
items.description: From this section you can scope mobile apps. You can use it either to pentest and evaluate the security of your own application, or analyze the applications that you and your team use on daily basis and find out if your information is properly protected.

items.title: Cloud Resources
items.description: This module holds the cloud assets of your organization. Our capabilities are limited to Amazon Web Services, Microsoft Azure, and GCP.

items.title: LAN Resources
items.description: This module allows you to define local area network assets, or internal access and provide our team access one.

items.title: Source Code
items.description: Supervise your development cycle and processes with a dedicated specialist with proven expertise in the required stack. If you are thinking about adding a dependency to your source code, you may also be interested in analyzing such dependencies to avoid supply chain attacks.

items.title: Socials
items.description: From this section you can add names, email addresses, phone numbers, and some other information of your staff member in order to conduct social engineering attacks. Codefend delivers complex/advanced social engineering attacks throughout different channels.

sections.title: Communication and Reporting
sections.description: The application encompasses 3 specialized modules designed to streamline communication and reporting for your pentesting needs. Each module serves a distinct purpose to enhance your experience and efficiency in managing security assessments.

items.title: Issues
items.description: Visualize and address vulnerabilities. Allows you to view each issue or vulnerability present in your assets. Provides a platform to request assistance within the issue interface if additional support is required. Tailor your approach to handling specific vulnerabilities efficiently.

items.title: Create Reports
items.description: Create customized reports on demand. Enables you to select a group of issues (e.g., web or mobile resources) and generate detailed, tailored reports. Choose specific parameters and criteria for the report to meet your reporting needs. Efficiency, streamlines the process of generating comprehensive reports for effective communication.

items.title: Customer Support
items.description: Address IT security business requirements. Provides a dedicated space to request special assistance for any specific IT security needs. Personalized Support: Tailor support requests to match your unique business security concerns. Facilitates a direct channel for obtaining timely and specialized support.

metadata.title: Codefend Industries: Tailored Cybersecurity Solutions for Every Sector
metadata.description: Explore how Codefend provides tailored cybersecurity services across various industries. Our platform offers a wide range of services designed to protect your organization from cyber threats, ensuring the highest level of security for your data and infrastructure.

mainContent.title: Industries
mainContent.subtitle: Codefend is your comprehensive solution for all your company's security needs. Our application combines a wide range of services designed to protect your organization from cyber threats, ensuring the highest level of protection for your data & infrastructure.

items.title: Medicine
items.description: Keep your patient`s information secure with Codefend. We enhance the protection of sensitive data, patient records, and health information with our cutting-edge security risk management solutions. We ensure ongoing compliance with HIPAA regulations for patient privacy, taking healthcare security to the next level. With Codefend, healthcare organizations and professionals can focus on what matters most: their patients.

items.title: Financial
items.description: Protect your customers' funds. In a high-risk threat environment, Codefend deploys advanced security risk management solutions for financial institutions. We identify, prioritize, and effectively manage vulnerabilities and access risks in a constantly evolving threat landscape. We restore trust and increase consumer confidence in these vital institutions, protecting against cybercriminals and cyber terrorists.

items.title: Government
items.description: Citizens are paramount. Facing the rising tide of cyber attacks in the public sector, Codefend introduces leading solutions in vulnerabilities and access risks. We enable federal government agencies to stay compliant, follow standards set by the National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST), and reduce their overall threat surface.

items.title: Retail
items.description: Keep selling with peace of mind. With the volume of transactions processed by retail organizations daily, Codefend advances security with risk management solutions specifically designed for the retail sector. Maintain PCI compliance and gain a clear view of retail network security, potential vulnerabilities, threats, and access risks to stay ahead of cyber threats. Focus on delivering great customer experiences to drive your business forward.

items.title: Energy and Utilities
items.description: Keep crucial systems running. Codefend provides advanced security risk management solutions for utility and energy companies. We focus on being proactive against threats, based on access risks, vulnerabilities, attack patterns, and known exploits. Protect critical infrastructure devices, SCADA networks, and critical application servers.

items.title: Education
items.description: Secure the future of education with Codefend. Our cybersecurity solutions for higher education provide strong protection against persistent security challenges. Utilizing advanced technology, we safeguard extensive digital assets from continual vulnerabilities. Codefend empowers security teams to mitigate critical vulnerabilities and access risks effectively, reducing threats. We ensure proper functioning of defensive mechanisms and readiness for mandatory compliance audits.

items.title: Software Development
items.description: Innovate confidently with Codefend, safeguarding your software development processes. Our advanced security risk management solutions prioritize the protection of source code, intellectual property, and development environments. Codefend empowers software development teams to focus on innovation, code quality, and collaboration, all while maintaining the highest standards of cybersecurity.

items.title: Fintech
items.description: Elevate financial technology with Codefend, ensuring the security of your fintech operations. Our cutting-edge security risk management solutions prioritize the protection of financial transactions, customer data, and compliance with industry regulations. Codefend enables fintech companies to innovate with confidence, delivering secure and seamless financial experiences for customers.

items.title: Oil and Gas
items.description: Secure critical operations in the oil and gas industry with Codefend. Our advanced security risk management solutions focus on protecting industrial control systems (ICS), critical infrastructure, and sensitive operational data. Codefend ensures the continuity and security of oil and gas operations, mitigating the risks associated with cyber threats.

items.title: Construction
items.description: Build with confidence using Codefend, securing your construction operations. Our comprehensive security risk management solutions prioritize the protection of project data, construction equipment, and critical infrastructure. Codefend empowers construction companies to focus on project delivery, safety, and efficiency, all while maintaining a secure digital environment.

items.title: Tourism & Hotels
items.description: Ensure a secure and seamless experience for tourists with Codefend, safeguarding your tourism and hotel operations. Our advanced security risk management solutions prioritize the protection of customer reservations, personal information, and payment transactions. Codefend enables tourism and hotel businesses to focus on providing exceptional guest experiences, building trust and loyalty.

items.title: Real Estate
items.description: Protect real estate operations with Codefend, ensuring the security of property transactions and sensitive data. Our comprehensive security risk management solutions prioritize the protection of property information, client data, and financial transactions. Codefend empowers real estate businesses to operate confidently in the digital landscape, providing secure and reliable services to clients.

items.title: Logistics & Transportation
items.description: Optimize logistics and transportation operations with Codefend, ensuring the security of supply chain processes and critical infrastructure. Our advanced security risk management solutions prioritize the protection of supply chain data, transportation systems, and sensitive operational information. Codefend empowers logistics and transportation companies to operate efficiently in a secure digital environment.

items.title: Blockchain & Web 3.0
items.description: Navigate the decentralized landscape securely with Codefend, protecting your operations within the dynamic world of cryptocurrencies and blockchain. Our advanced security risk management solutions prioritize the protection of blockchain networks, digital assets, and transactional data. Codefend empowers businesses within the cryptocurrencies and blockchain ecosystem to innovate and thrive while ensuring the highest standards of cybersecurity.

metadata.title: Codefend Services: Expert Cybersecurity Intelligence and Solutions
metadata.description: Discover Codefend's comprehensive range of cybersecurity services, including web and mobile application penetration testing, cloud security assessments, and more. Our unified platform allows you to monitor your organization's security and infrastructure, ensuring direct communication between your security team and our professionals for optimal protection.

subtitle.title: Services
subtitle.description: Codefend offers cybersecurity intel, research, and security services, all unified in a unique platform. Allowing you to monitor your assets, infrastructure and your organization's security, while establishing direct communication between our professionals and your security team.

subTitle.title: web application penetration test
subTitle.description: Codefend does manual and semi-automated penetration testing processes using commercial and proprietary security software to evaluate your web application from the perspective of anonymous and authenticated users.

slide.details: Codefend specializes in providing penetration testing services focused on assessing the security of web applications and web APIs. Our team of security experts conducts thorough tests to identify and mitigate potential vulnerabilities, ensuring the robustness and resilience of your web applications and services against potential threats. With a focus on risk detection and security strengthening, our assessments provide a comprehensive perspective to help ensure the protection of your digital assets against possible attacks and security breaches.
benefits: Identifies and mitigates web application vulnerabilities.
Enhances web application resilience against cyber threats.
Provides a comprehensive security perspective for digital assets.

subTitle.title: mobile application penetration test
subTitle.description: Ensure the security of your mobile application with our decentralized mobile application pentest services. Protect your user’s sensitive information with our professional services.

slide.details: Codefend extends its expertise to provide penetration testing services tailored for mobile applications. Our dedicated team of security professionals conducts comprehensive assessments to evaluate the security of your mobile apps. Through rigorous testing, we identify and address potential vulnerabilities, enhancing the resilience of your mobile applications against security threats. With a strategic focus on risk detection and security reinforcement, our assessments offer a holistic perspective, ensuring the safeguarding of your digital assets from potential attacks and security breaches.
benefits: Evaluates and addresses mobile app security risks.
Strengthens the resilience of mobile applications.
Offers a holistic approach to safeguarding digital assets.

subTitle.title: internal network pentest
subTitle.description: Codefend conducts thorough penetration tests within your internal network environment. We simulate real-world attacks to identify vulnerabilities and assess the security resilience of your internal systems, ensuring comprehensive protection against potential threats.

slide.details: Our internal network penetration testing simulates real-world attacks originating from within your organization. This assessment helps evaluate the effectiveness of internal security controls and identifies vulnerabilities that may be exploited by insiders or malicious actors.

subTitle.title: source code review
subTitle.description: Codefend conducts meticulous reviews of your application's source code. Our specialized analysis uncovers potential security flaws, ensuring robust protection by identifying and addressing vulnerabilities at the code level.

slide.details: Codefend offers source code review services to thoroughly examine your application's source code for security vulnerabilities. Our experts provide in-depth analysis to identify and address potential security issues, ensuring the integrity of your software.
benefits: Thoroughly examines and secures application source code.
Identifies and addresses potential security issues.
Ensures the integrity and security of software.

subTitle.title: advanced social engineering
subTitle.description: Codefend uses sophisticated techniques to test your organization's human defenses, identifying vulnerabilities and providing insights to enhance security awareness and resilience.

slide.details: Our advanced social engineering tests go beyond traditional methods to assess your organization's susceptibility to sophisticated social engineering attacks. This includes targeted phishing, vishing, and other techniques to evaluate human-centric security risks.
benefits: Assesses susceptibility to sophisticated social engineering attacks.
Evaluates human-centric security risks with targeted techniques.
Strengthens defenses against social engineering threats.

subTitle.title: cloud security posture
subTitle.description: Codefend offers robust cloud security assessments using advanced manual and automated techniques. We leverage a blend of commercial and proprietary tools to ensure comprehensive protection for your cloud infrastructure.

slide.details: Codefend also offers Cloud Security Posture Management services, helping you evaluate and enhance the security of your cloud infrastructure. Our team assesses your cloud security posture, identifies misconfigurations, and provides recommendations to fortify your cloud environment. With a proactive approach to cloud security, we assist in mitigating risks and ensuring a robust security foundation for your cloud-based assets.
benefits: Evaluates and enhances cloud infrastructure security.
Identifies and rectifies misconfigurations in the cloud.
Provides proactive measures for robust cloud security.

metadata.title: Codefend Compliance: Cybersecurity Standards and Solutions
metadata.description: Ensure your organization meets industry standards with Codefend's compliance services. Our platform provides comprehensive cybersecurity intelligence, research, and tools to help you navigate ISO standards and other common security challenges. Easily search and find the solutions you need to protect your assets and maintain compliance.

hero.title: Compliance and industry standars
hero.description: Codefend offers cybersecurity research, and security services, all unified in a unique platform. Allowing you to monitor your assets, infrastructure and your organization's security, while establishing direct communication between professionals and your security team.

complianceData.title: PCI-DSS
complianceData.description1: Securing Your Payment Card Transactions. PCI DSS is a mandatory standard for organizations handling cardholder data. It plays a crucial role in preventing payment card fraud and securing cardholder information in transaction processes. This standard is particularly vital for retail, e-commerce, and financial services sectors.
complianceData.description2: Our services include conducting in-depth security assessments and implementing cutting-edge solutions to meet every aspect of PCI DSS requirements. Our extensive experience in payment security, robust risk mitigation, and continuous compliance support makes Codefend an invaluable ally in maintaining PCI DSS compliance.

complianceData.title: ISO/IEC 27002
complianceData.description1: ISO/IEC 27002, part of the ISO/IEC 27000 family of standards, provides guidelines and best practices for information security controls. It offers a comprehensive set of information security control objectives and a wide range of controls that organizations can implement to secure their information assets.
complianceData.description2: At Codefend, we specialize in aligning your organization’s security measures with ISO/IEC 27002’s best practices. Our services include detailed analysis of your current security controls, recommendations for improvement, and assistance in implementing effective security measures. We help ensure that your organization’s information security management practices are comprehensive and up-to-date with the latest standards in the industry.

complianceData.title: SOC1 COMPLIANCE
complianceData.description1: Financial Reporting and Control Assurance. SOC1 is focused on controls at a service organization relevant to user entities internal control over financial reporting. This is particularly important for businesses that handle financial transactions or data that could impact their clients financial reporting.
complianceData.description2: Codefend's Approach to SOC1: Codefend offers expert assistance in evaluating and improving the controls related to financial reporting. Our services include assessing the design and operating effectiveness of these controls, ensuring they meet the SOC1 standards and providing comprehensive support in preparing for and undergoing SOC1 audits.

complianceData.title: NIST 800-43
complianceData.description1: Comprehensive Security and Privacy Controls. NIST Special Publication 800-53 provides a catalog of security and privacy controls for federal information systems and organizations. It is a cornerstone for developing comprehensive information security and privacy programs, offering a detailed framework to protect critical assets against diverse cyber threats.
complianceData.description2: At Codefend, we deliver expert consulting services to align your organization's security practices with the NIST 800-53 standards. Our approach includes an in-depth evaluation of your current security posture against the NIST 800-53 control catalog, identifying gaps, and recommending enhancements. We assist in implementing tailored security and privacy controls, ensuring robust protection of your systems and data. Our strategic guidance empowers your organization to meet or exceed the stringent security requirements outlined in NIST 800-53.

complianceData.title: ISO-27001
complianceData.description1: Enhancing Your Information Security Management. Discover ISO 27001, the international gold standard in establishing, maintaining, and continually improving an Information Security Management System (ISMS). This standard is pivotal in safeguarding your organizational data against cyber threats and ensuring data confidentiality, integrity, and availability. It is primarily beneficial for sectors like finance, healthcare, and IT services.
complianceData.description2: Leveraging our network of elite cybersecurity professionals, we offer unparalleled guidance in implementing robust ISMS frameworks. Our services encompass every step towards ISO 27001 certification – from meticulous risk assessments to customizing security strategies – ensuring your business meets and exceeds these rigorous standards. With our expertise in comprehensive risk management and bespoke security solutions, Codefend stands as your ideal partner in achieving ISO 27001 compliance.

complianceData.title: NIST CYBERSECURITY FRAMEWORK
complianceData.description1: Strengthening Your Cyber Resilience. The NIST Cybersecurity Framework, developed by the National Institute of Standards and Technology, offers a flexible and comprehensive framework for managing and reducing cybersecurity risk. It is widely adopted across various sectors, providing guidelines that are applicable to organizations of all sizes and types.
complianceData.description2: Codefend’s approach to the NIST Cybersecurity Framework involves integrating its core functions – Identify, Protect, Detect, Respond, and Recover – into your organization’s cybersecurity strategy. We provide expert consultation to tailor this framework to your specific needs, ensuring effective risk management and enhanced cyber resilience. Our team assists in the framework’s implementation, periodic reviews, and continuous improvement, aligning your cybersecurity practices with industry best standards.

complianceData.title: SOC2 COMPLIANCE
complianceData.description1: Security, Availability, Processing Integrity, Confidentiality, and Privacy. SOC2 is designed for businesses that store customer data in the cloud, focusing on five trust service principles: security, availability, processing integrity, confidentiality, and privacy. It's essential for cloud computing providers, SaaS companies, and businesses in the financial services sector.
complianceData.description2: Codefend's Advantage in SOC2: We specialize in creating custom security frameworks, conducting rigorous auditing processes, and maintaining operational integrity to meet SOC2 requirements. Codefend assists in both SOC2 Type 1 (evaluating the design of controls at a specific point in time) and SOC2 Type 2 (assessing the operational effectiveness of these controls over a period).

complianceData.title: CCPA
complianceData.description1: Aligning with California's Privacy Standards. The California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA) is a significant state statute in the United States aimed at enhancing privacy rights and consumer protection for residents of California. The CCPA grants California consumers new rights regarding their personal information and imposes various data protection duties on certain businesses dealing with California residents.
complianceData.description2: Codefend provides comprehensive assistance to ensure your business is fully compliant with CCPA. Our services include evaluating your current data practices, enhancing privacy policies, and ensuring proper handling of consumer data requests. We help you understand and navigate the CCPA requirements, focusing on transparency, consumer rights, and effective data management. Codefend's expertise ensures that your organization not only complies with CCPA but also strengthens its overall data privacy framework.

complianceData.title: GDPR
complianceData.description1: Ensuring Data Privacy and Protection. The General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) is a pivotal regulation enacted by the European Union to govern data protection and privacy. This regulation has set a new standard for privacy rights, security, and compliance, profoundly impacting how organizations around the world manage and protect personal data.
complianceData.description2: Codefend offers specialized services to ensure your organization's compliance with GDPR. Our approach includes conducting thorough data audits, implementing robust data protection policies, and ensuring transparent data processing activities. We provide guidance on data subject rights, data breach response, and maintaining continual compliance with GDPR. With Codefend, you can navigate the complexities of GDPR, ensuring the highest standards of data privacy and protection for your customers.

complianceData.title: HIPAA COMPLIANCE
complianceData.description1: Safeguarding Patient Health Information. HIPAA sets the standard for protecting sensitive patient data. Adhering to HIPAA compliance is non-negotiable for ensuring the confidentiality, integrity, and security of patient health information (PHI). Healthcare providers, insurance companies, and healthcare clearinghouses are among the primary entities where HIPAA compliance is critical.
complianceData.description2: Our approach includes ensuring rigorous safeguarding of PHI, compliance training for your staff, and regular audits to maintain adherence to HIPAA regulations. We specialize in advanced PHI protection strategies, comprehensive compliance training, and ongoing support, placing your organization at the forefront of HIPAA compliance.

complianceData.title: SOC3 COMPLIANCE
complianceData.description1: General Controls Report for a Wider Audience. SOC3 is a general-use report that provides a high-level overview of an organization's controls related to the trust service principles, similar to SOC2 but without the detailed disclosures. It's useful for businesses that want to demonstrate their commitment to these principles without sharing the specifics of their controls.
complianceData.description2: Codefend's Strategy for SOC3: Our team assists in developing SOC3 reports that communicate an organization's adherence to trust principles in a format suitable for the general public. This helps in reinforcing trust and transparency with clients and stakeholders without revealing sensitive or detailed internal control information.

complianceData.title: CMMC
complianceData.description1: Securing Defense Supply Chain Data. The Cybersecurity Maturity Model Certification (CMMC) is a certification process established by the United States Department of Defense (DoD). It's designed to certify that contractors in the defense supply chain have the necessary controls to protect sensitive data, including Federal Contract Information (FCI) and Controlled Unclassified Information (CUI).
complianceData.description2: Codefend offers tailored solutions to help your organization achieve CMMC compliance. We specialize in conducting comprehensive assessments to determine your current cybersecurity maturity level and identify areas for improvement. Our team provides strategic guidance on implementing the necessary practices and processes to meet the CMMC requirements, from Level 1 (basic cyber hygiene) to Level 5 (advanced). By partnering with Codefend, you can ensure that your organization is ready for CMMC certification, a crucial step for engaging in contracts with the DoD.

metadata.title: Codefend Partners: Collaboration and Benefits
metadata.description: Discover how Codefend partners with leading organizations to enhance cybersecurity. Our platform offers a comprehensive suite of services, including cybersecurity intelligence, research, and security solutions. Learn about the benefits of becoming a partner, the resources available, and how we can work together to strengthen your security posture.

hero.title: Partners and Business allies
hero.description: Codefend offers cybersecurity intel, research, and security services, all unified in  unique platform. Allowing you to monitor your assets, infrastructure and your organization's security, while establishing direct communication between our professionals and your security team.

about.title: Expand your services and earn 25% per sale

card1.cardTitle: EXPAND YOUR SERVICE CATALOG AND EARN 25% ON EACH SALE
card1.paragraph1: Unlock a lucrative opportunity with Codefend by becoming one of our trusted distributors. Simply fill out your information, and our team will promptly reach out to you. Enjoy a generous 25% commission on the net sale price of our diverse range of plans, designed to meet all client needs. You have the flexibility to choose whether you collect payments directly from clients or let us handle it for you.
card1.paragraph2: Don’t miss out on this chance to expand your business and increase your revenue with Codefend. Our flexible plans and seamless support make it easy for you to start earning right away. Join us today and experience the benefits of partnering with a leader in the industry.

card2.paragraph1: At Codefend, we're looking for commercial partners to expand our distribution network and bring our cybersecurity solutions to more clients. We value long-term, mutually beneficial relationships and are ready to tailor terms to meet your specific needs. Partnering with us gives you access to advanced cybersecurity products and the support of our expert team, enabling us to tackle today's toughest security challenges together.

partnerForm.title: DISTRIBUTOR CONTACT FORM
partnerForm.description: Unlock a lucrative opportunity with Codefend by becoming one of our trusted distributors.

metadata.title: Codefend About Us: Meet the Minds Behind Codefend's Cybersecurity Solutions
metadata.description: Discover how Codefend unites cutting-edge cybersecurity research, services, and expertise on a single platform. Get to know our team, led by industry veterans, as we help you safeguard your assets and maintain robust security for your organization.

hero.title: About us
hero.description: Codefend offers cybersecurity intel, research, and security services, all unified in a unique platform. Allowing you to monitor your assets, infrastructure and your organization's security, while establishing direct communication between our professionals and your security team.

chris.name: Christian 'Ch' Russo
chris.professionalSummary:
Based on the information provided and the search results, it appears that Christian "Ch" Russo is a hacker who has been involved in several high-profile security breaches. However, due to the limitations in accessing the LinkedIn profile and other direct sources, the following resume is constructed based on the information available from the KrebsOnSecurity articles and other related content.

Christian "Ch" Russo is a security researcher and hacker known for exposing vulnerabilities in major websites. With a background in coding in PHP and using SQL databases, Russo has demonstrated a deep understanding of web security and the implications of data breaches.
chris.keyAchievements: Identified and exposed security flaws in The Pirate Bay's database, gaining access to user information including usernames and hashed passwords - Contacted eHarmony offering to sell security services to help the company fix security flaws, which eHarmony declined - Involved in a security breach at PlentyOfFish.com, although the details of this involvement are not specified in the search results.

edgardo.name: Edgardo Krause
edgardo.professionalSummary:
Edgardo Krause is an experienced Senior Security Engineer with a focus on cybersecurity and penetration testing. He specializes in identifying and mitigating security vulnerabilities in web applications, mobile applications, and network infrastructure. With a strong background in security research, testing automation, and software development, Edgardo is dedicated to staying ahead of emerging threats and trends in the field. He has a proven track record in contributing to global security efforts and has worked on various penetration testing and red teaming engagements.

He holds public recognitions from different companies and governments, among them the US Department of State and the CERN.

miguel.name: Miguel Peroni
miguel.professionalSummary:
Miguel is a highly skilled Senior Technology & Business Consultant with a proven track record of delivering innovative solutions and driving business growth. Offering a wealth of experience in strategic planning, project management, and client relationship management. Focusing to leverage their expertise to contribute to the success of dynamic organization as Codefend is.

Miguel has a wide work experience with the most important technology vendors like: Cisco Systems, Proofpoint, Lenovo, DellEMC, IXSystems, HPE, Aruba, Fortinet, Juniper, Checkpoint, Nokia, Palo Alto, Huawei, RedHat, Microsoft, Veeam, Acronis, Tenable, IBM, SolarWinds, Progress - Ipswitch.

He is based in Latam from where he has been traveling & providing services for companies in North, Central and South America: Financial Services, Manufacturing, Media & Entertainment, Technology, Telco, Retail, and Government entities.

ignacio.name: Ignacio Gómez
ignacio.professionalSummary:
Ignacio Gómez is a distinguished expert specializing in the intricate field of product and user behavior. His expertise lies in the strategic application of behavioral science to final products, enabling a profound understanding of user interactions with digital environments.

Throughout his career, Gómez has been instrumental in conducting advanced human behavior research at major corporations. His work primarily involves dissecting complex user interactions and employing this knowledge to enhance interface design, thereby subtly guiding user actions and decisions. His approach is deeply rooted in technical sophistication, focusing on the psychological aspects of user interaction rather than mere aesthetic design.
ignacio.keyAchievements: Developed sophisticated models for predicting user behavior, significantly enhancing user engagement and satisfaction - Successfully implemented strategies for user behavior manipulation through interface design, resulting in improved business outcomes for several large-scale corporations.

contact.subtitle: We’re here to help you secure your systems.
contact.description: Have questions or need assistance? Reach out to us by filling out the form below, and our team will get back to you as soon as possible.

metadata.title: Codefend Pricing: Customized Cybersecurity Penetration Testing Services
metadata.description: Explore Codefend's flexible pricing options for comprehensive cybersecurity services, including web, mobile, and cloud infrastructure penetration testing. Get tailored security solutions that protect your digital assets.

quote.title: Get a Price Estimate
quote.subtitle: Calculate the cost of your next service!
quote.description: Below, you'll find reference values for our services. Please note that these are estimates and must be confirmed by our commercial team if accepted.

web.title: Web Applications
web.description: Add from this section the web applications you want to pentest. We classify web applications into 3 pre-defined sizes based on an estimated scale.

mobile.title: Mobile Applications
mobile.description: Add from this section the mobile applications you want to pentest. We classify mobile applications into 3 pre-defined sizes based on an estimated scale.

cloud.title: Cloud Providers
cloud.description: Add from this section the cloud providers you want to assess. We classify cloud providers into 3 pre-defined sizes based on an estimated scale.

source.title: Source Code Repositories
source.description: Add from this section the source code repositories you want to assess. We classify repositories into 3 pre-defined sizes based on an estimated scale.

social.title: Social Engineering Attacks
social.description: Use this section to add the social engineering scenarios you want to simulate. We classify social engineering techniques into 3 pre-defined categories based on the complexity and potential impact.

internalIp.title: Internal IP Security
internalIp.description: Use this section to add the internal IP addresses you want to manage or analyze. We classify internal IPs into 3 pre-defined categories based on their role and importance within your infrastructure.

externalIp.title: External IP Security
externalIp.description: Use this section to add the external IP addresses you want to manage or analyze. We classify external IPs into 3 pre-defined categories based on their role and exposure within your infrastructure.

setting.title: Pricing Configuration
setting.description: Use this section to adjust the pricing intensity for your services. Modify the slider to increase or decrease the estimated price percentage according to your needs.
